specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Replication to Remote Site Down
defaultDescription: Database replication to the remote site is down.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Replication to Remote Site Delayed
defaultDescription: The delay of database replication to the remote site has crossed the threshold.
Database high load has exceeded the configured threshold.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Database Memory Usage High
defaultDescription: Database memory usage has exceeded the configured threshold.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Database Disk Usage High
defaultDescription: Database disk usage has exceeded the configured threshold.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Database Server Memory Usage High
defaultDescription: Database server memory usage has exceeded the configured threshold.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Database Server Load High
defaultDescription: Database server high load has exceeded the configured threshold.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor Database Server Disk Usage High
defaultDescription: Database server disk usage has exceeded the configured threshold.

specificProblem: UDR eric-udr-dbmonitor DB Server Off-Heap Fragmentation High
defaultDescription: Database server offHeap fragmentation has exceeded the configured threshold.
